title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2024 (S.I. No. 354 of 2024),
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic (Licensing of
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Road Traffic (Licensing of 

Drivers) (Fees) Regulations 2024. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 1 January 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited road traffic (licensing drivers) (fees) regulation 2024 (2) regulation come operation 1 january 2025

title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2024 (S.I. No. 354 of 2024),
heading: 2. The fee to be paid to the licensing authority on the application to it in
text_raw:
2. The fee to be paid to the licensing authority on the application to it in 
respect of any of the licences referred to in column (1) of the Schedule is set out 
in column (2) of the Schedule opposite the mention of the licence.
text_norm: 2 fee paid licensing authority application respect licence referred column (1) schedule set column (2) schedule opposite mention licence

title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2024 (S.I. No. 354 of 2024),
heading: 3. The Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) (Fees) Regulations 2020 (S. I.
text_raw:
3. The Road Traffic (Licensing of Drivers) (Fees) Regulations 2020 (S. I. 

No. 75 of 2020) are revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 6th December, 2024.

Schedule 

Licence 

(1) 

10 year (or a period greater than 3 years) driving licence 

3 year driving licence 

1 year driving licence 

Learner permit 

Duplicate driving licence or learner permit 

Exchange of foreign driving licence 

Additional new category to driving licence or learner permit 

Removal of category from driving licence or learner permit 

Replacement licence exchanged abroad 

GIVEN under my hand, 
4 December, 2024. 

JAMES LAWLESS, 

Minister of State at the Department of Transport.

title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No. 2) Order 2024 (S.I. No. 354 of 2024),
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations update fees for driving licences and learner permits.
